sentences.en: Bullfrogs became lethargic with the first cold nights.
sentences.cn: 在开始的那些寒冷夜晚,牛蛙变得无精打采.

sentences.en: Chronic Shang Jian felt slowly, even lethargic sleep.
sentences.cn: 慢性尚见感觉迟钝, 甚至昏睡.

sentences.en: However, rainy days sometimes make people feel melancholy and lethargic.
sentences.cn: 不过, 雨天有时会给人一种忧郁、消极的感觉.

sentences.en: In fact heavy meal or one loaded with carbs can do you feel sluggish and lethargic.
sentences.cn: 事实上,大餐或者很多碳水化合物的吃的东西会让你感到懒散乏力、昏昏欲睡.

sentences.en: It made us all lethargic before we had gone far.
sentences.cn: 行不多远,大伙儿都意兴索然.

sentences.en: It'served to make him rebellious and hence lethargic at times.
sentences.cn: 这种情况引起他对现状的反抗心理,有时候便老是没精打采.

sentences.en: Out of the blue you feel lethargic and drained.
sentences.cn: 由于沮丧你会感觉昏昏沉沉,头脑不好使.

sentences.en: Some infants might have a fever and seem lethargic and unresponsive.
sentences.cn: 一些婴儿也许正发烧并显得昏昏欲睡毫无生气.

sentences.en: Spitting spiders are so lethargic that you'd swear they could never catch anything.
sentences.cn: 喷唾型蜘蛛总是有气无力、昏昏欲睡,你会因此断言它们什么也抓不到.

sentences.en: The cat became lethargic and had trouble breathing.
sentences.cn: 这只猫整天昏睡而且呼吸困难。

sentences.en: The great earth has come to a full night's lethargic slumber!
sentences.cn: 接着便是屡屡炊烟,缭绕空际,人欢马叫,汽笛长鸣,酣睡了一夜的大地苏醒了.

sentences.en: The hot weather made me feel lethargic.
sentences.cn: 炎热的天气使我昏昏欲睡.

sentences.en: The koala seemed to be asleep, and I wondered for the first time just how one went about startling such a lethargic creature.
sentences.cn: 那只树熊似乎睡着了。 第一次干这活儿，我真不知怎么去惊吓一只昏睡的动物。

sentences.en: The organisers say they are also considering giving a prize to the slowest cell, since lethargic cells would be a boon for cancer therapy.
sentences.cn: 主办方表示他们也在考虑颁一个奖给速度最慢的细胞，因为这种昏睡细胞也是癌症治疗的福音。

sentences.en: The stuffy room made her lethargic.
sentences.cn: 闷热不通风的房间使她昏昏欲睡.

sentences.en: Under the influence of the medicine, I have been quite lethargic lately.
sentences.cn: 在药物的影响下, 我近来很爱睡.

sentences.en: When you wake up feeling really lethargic, really lousy.
sentences.cn: 当你醒来感觉很疲惫, 很糟糕.

sentences.en: Your own obsession with false - imbalances has made you lethargic and hypocritical.
sentences.cn: 对于不平衡的执著使你变得感觉迟钝并且伪善.

trans.tran_cn: 昏睡的，没精打采的，懒洋洋的，暮气沉沉，苶
